Package common

Class WaitingChecker

java.lang.Object
common.WaitingChecker
public class WaitingChecker extends Object
The WaitingChecker class provides utility methods for checking and managing waiting lists.

    • GetLastWaiting

      public static Integer GetLastWaiting()
      Retrieves the ID of the last waiting list entry.
      Returns:
      The ID of the last waiting list entry.

    • FindRightPlaceInWaiting

      public static Integer FindRightPlaceInWaiting(String visitDate, String visitTime, String parkName)
      Finds the right place in the waiting list for a new entry based on visit date, visit time, and park name.
      Parameters:
      visitDate - The date of the visit.
      visitTime - The time of the visit.
      parkName - The name of the park.
      Returns:
      The position in the waiting list where the new entry should be placed.

    • PostNewWaitingList

      public static Boolean PostNewWaitingList(WaitingList waiting)
      Posts a new entry to the waiting list.
      Parameters:
      waiting - The WaitingList object representing the new entry.
      Returns:
      True if the new entry was successfully added to the waiting list, else false.
